channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6713] FF imports are not triggered from the shop
item.description:
1.1 Imports are not triggered from the shop

  • Needs to be tested by us.

Check the FF export Job. Why is the import SOAP Request not done after a successful export?
item.summary: FF imports are not triggered from the shop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
tested in local environment with FF Q:

I will add 2 new flags on the FF export cronjob. These flags indicate if the FF import & FF suggest import was successfully triggered or not.
extended logging, extended import timeout for Q, added new import flags as described before. Committed in v3.3.1. Ready for Q deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6674] Proxy errors
item.description:
Distrelec.de is responding extremely slow. -> Proxy errors probably because FF-involvement.

Assumption: The FF-Nodes 2 and 5 which are used for Reco and campaigns seem to be root-cause of the problem.

Actions

  1. Check if the load is significantly higher on those ff-nodes since the last p-deployment(P-normal: 26/Mar/2015, P-hotfix: 08/Apr/2015).
  2. Check if the loading of FF-components on Prod-detail page is done a- or synchronous.

Results
...

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: e-mail sent to David. Who handles this?

@Önder: Please check the performance of the Server and let's re-plan a Performance test begining of next week

@Oana: In such cases we Need to know what goes slow: search, only site call, only product Detail page, everything and a timeframe as it is usually for one user only limited in time.

FYI: we have today an issue with the Network in Germany (Hardware issue). I wrote Mirco if the Problem was/is only within Distrelec or if customers have complaint. So, I'm directly in contact with Mirco...

Parts of the FF campaigns are loaded synchronous:

com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.ProductPageController.productDetail()

  • populateFeedbackCampaign(productCode, model)

So if the FF Reco/Campaign Nodes have problems, the rendering of the ProductDetail page will be blocked.

Hi Will

Could you please check if this campaign data could also be loaded asynchronous?

Backend is done accordingly. The feedback campaigns can be loaded asynchronous by an ajax call to:

//local
http://distrelec-ch.local:9001/de/p/17605413/feedback-campaigns
//general
/de/p/{productCode}/feedback-campains

Cheers
Will
The problem is that, on the backend, the captains are also loaded synchronous (populateFeedbackCampaign). Why is this done.
The Business is expecting to have this issue solved tomorrow with the deployment. Would be great if you could do it..

Why do we need to call the method "populateFeedbackCampaign" (ProductPageController, on line 304),
when the FE is loading the campaigns asynchronous?

Hi all

populateFeedbackCampaign is already removed branch v3.3. I added this method to ProductPageRecommendationController LN 75 feedbackCampaigns() v3.3. The campaigns can be loaded asynchronous now. Ruben will do the frontend implementation.

Cheers
Will

This fix will only solve the proxy error on the product-detail page.
The error will remain on the search (search result page) maybe also on other pages.

Since this error began with the deployment of the campaign on the product detail page,
we should consider deactivating this feature until we have a stable solution.
Or we could load the load all campaigns asynchronously.

Do we know all pages where campaigns are loaded?

@Önder, Rafal
Who will take care of this decisions?
Hi Rafi: want you check that with David? - It's a fair question from René, if we should deactivate the campaigns or if we would like to have it online for further analyses?
What spots are still to be changed to asynchronous?

I'm currently working on this one: DISTRELEC-5984

We will load by ajax (async) this slot for FF campaigns on the Product detail page

From the discussion with Will:

We recommend to set a timeout on campaigns (i.e.: 3 sec. also on the search result page),
so we can avoid a proxy error on all pages.
But we need to check for proper exception handling first,

In a second step we could also load the campaigns on the search result page asynchronous.

The timeout could possibly be included in the the todays hostfix release.

Hi Will,
as discussed, send this ticket back to me if there's any FrontEnd changes needed.
Thanks

Hi all

As discussed with René Hämmerli from Namics, I need to set the global Timeout for the Campaign and Reco Services from 5 minutes to 5 seconds. And we need to add a configuration parameter to enable / disable the campaigns on the product detail page.

Cheers
Will

Changes are implemented and committed in v3.3.1. Ready for Q deployment.

Parameter to switchoff the campaigns on the product detail page: switchoff.productdetail.campaigns=true

The parameter has to be added in the hac/configuration on each node.

Cheers
Will

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6639] comparison list- button " delete all" doesn't work
item.description:
Mit bestem Dank und liebem Gruss

Best regards - and thank you.

Beat Eugster
Stv. Leiter Technischer Support

+41 44 944 9 760

 
[Created via e-mail received from: "Eugster, Beat" <beat.eugster@distrelec.com>]
item.summary: comparison list- button " delete all" doesn't work

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi, I can able to delete the compare list as shown in the screenshot.
Please review
As discussed: Please find a way to speed the function up as it is very sloppy at the moment.
HI. i never found a problem with the speed during deletion

Hi Surendra, I just tested this on Q and P after cleaning my cache and cookies. When I click on remove all, shortly the products dissapear for a second or two and then the products are back again. Can you recreate this from your side?
HI, NO. I tested it again and dont see any problem.
As discussed: Issue can be recreated on Q if you're not logged in. Please fix, thx.
Please review in v3.3.1
Added fixversion v3.3.1 - please always do that upon resolving, thx.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters
Please add some more Details to the description, thx.

Please read the detailed interface description directly in the wiki: http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters

There you find all the necessary information. Check all the 4 Interfaces on the SAP side and implement the changes as described in the wiki.
What kind of action is needed here?
Please add remaining estimate & answer florians question, thx.

Punchout interface problem:

13 Apr 2015 13:24:43 INFO  [task-scheduler-2] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed HeaderInitTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@c75f188[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150401145456155.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 9ms
13 Apr 2015 13:24:43 INFO  [task-scheduler-2] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed DistImpexTransformerTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@c75f188[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150401145456155.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 429ms
13 Apr 2015 13:24:43 INFO  [task-scheduler-2] [AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask] File 'C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150401145456155.csv' has no data, so it will be skipped.
13 Apr 2015 13:24:43 INFO  [task-scheduler-2] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$bd8115c.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@c75f188[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150401145456155.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 40ms
13 Apr 2015 13:24:43 INFO  [task-scheduler-2] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed CleanupTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@c75f188[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150401145456155.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 10ms

• distrelecB2Bcore-spring-integration-erp.xml
  • AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask.java
  • DefaultImpexConverter.java
  • DistImpexTransformerTask.java

The problem is the data in the received files. For SAP customers, we have in hybris the ErpCustomerID in the form:

000xxxxxxx

, however, the received ErpCustomerID's does not contains the zero's in front and this leads to customer not found.

Could check please. Thx

/Nabil.
Fix implemented and file was just exported from Q. Please check and confirm so we move it to Production.

Hi Evangelos

We recived the following files this evening:

-rw-rw-r-- 1 hybris hybris 275857 Apr 14 17:00 erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150414170055059.csv_20150414174029131
-rw-rw-r-- 1 hybris hybris    531 Apr 14 17:00 erp_punchoutfilt_ct-20150414170056367.csv_20150414174037685
-rw-rw-r-- 1 hybris hybris 291168 Apr 14 17:14 erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150414171445675.csv_20150414174048224
-rw-rw-r-- 1 hybris hybris    531 Apr 14 17:14 erp_punchoutfilt_ct-20150414171446429.csv_20150414174056350

I checked in the hmc:

  • 69 CU records were imported
  • 9 CT records were imported

I will have a look at the files tomorrow, to check if really all records were imported.

What I can say now is that we also need the following punchout files for testing on Q:

  • erp_punchoutfilt_co
  • erp_punchoutfilt_man
    --> in this file we need also the prefix "000" for the customer id

Cheers
Will

I did my analysis now. We still have a problem in our interface. I tried to import 122 records:

16 Apr 2015 16:23:31 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed HeaderInitTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@31550f4e[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150416081445695.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 8ms
16 Apr 2015 16:23:31 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed DistImpexTransformerTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@31550f4e[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150416081445695.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 28ms
16 Apr 2015 16:23:33 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [DefaultImportService] Starting import synchronous using cronjob with code=00000K28
16 Apr 2015 16:23:33 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] (00000K28) [ImpExImportJob] Starting multi-threaded ImpEx cronjob "ImpEx-Import" (3 threads)
16 Apr 2015 16:23:34 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] (00000K28) [Importer] Finished 1 pass in 0d 00h:00m:00s:518ms - processed: 122, no lines dumped (last pass 0)
16 Apr 2015 16:23:34 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [DefaultImportService] Import was successful (using cronjob with code=00000K28)
16 Apr 2015 16:23:37 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$bd8115c.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@31550f4e[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150416081445695.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 5480ms
16 Apr 2015 16:23:37 INFO  [task-scheduler-5] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed CleanupTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@31550f4e[file=C:\work\shop\trunk\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_punchoutfilt_cu-20150416081445695.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 9ms

In the log I see 122 records were successfully imported. But thats not the case. I checked the hmc and in fact there is only one record imported. I will recheck our datamodel and try to figure out the issue.

I fixed the import problem of the DistCUPunchOutFilter IF. Now I will check the other IFs:

  • DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter
  • DistCTPunchOutFilter
  • DistCOPunchOutFilter

I fixed the import of DistCTPunchOutFilter IF. Now I will check:

  • DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter -> change from SAP needed (sent mail to evangelos)
  • DistCOPunchOutFilter

EMAIL content:
Hi Evangelos

Can you pls change the manufacturer punchout export to:

salesOrg(code)[unique=true];erpCustomerID[unique=true];manufacturer(code)[unique=true];productHierarchy[unique=true];validFromDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];validUntilDate[dateformat=yyyyMMdd];lastModifiedErp[dateformat=yyyyMMddhhmmss]

Thx
Will

Hello Will,
As we discussed please remove the product hierarchy attribute.
I will update from my side the interface with the sales organization when it is to export the customer/manufacturer data.
Fix implemented in SAP. File was just exported from Q

I fixed the import of DistManufacturerPunchOutFilter IF. Now I will check:

  • DistCOPunchOutFilter
Also the DistCOPunchOutFilter IF is working correctly now. I will resolve the ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6391] Import Tool // Add error message to matching page
item.description:
If I have not selected any attribut from the dropdown there should be a error message direct on this page.

"Not enough attributes have been used for matching"

One of the 4 attributes must be assigned in order to continue.

  • No attribute may be assigned more than once.
  • display warning C63 above list uponm exception

Here you'll find the complete spec again: http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/C301-BOMMatchingTable
item.summary: Import Tool // Add error message to matching page

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
FE done. When none of the attributes have been selected, their values are 999:

<input type="hidden" name="articleNumberPosition" id="articleNumberPosition" value="999">
<input type="hidden" name="quantityPosition" id="quantityPosition"value="999">
<input type="hidden" name="referencePosition" id="referencePosition" value="999">

Please reassign to BE to show the error message in the same page.
Thanks
Should go into fixversion v3.3.1 - let me know if this isn't possible until 22.04 - 11 o'clock. thanks.
Please review

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6008] CZ, SK, HU, RO - Orderconfirmation-PDF missing & scrambled data
item.description:
The order-confirmation-pdf is missing some data, and the special-chars are not displayed correctly.

See in the screenshot:

  1. Special characters are not converted correctly.
  2. Payment mode is not shown.
  3. Delivery mode is not shown.
  4. Customer-number is not shown.
item.summary: CZ, SK, HU, RO - Orderconfirmation-PDF missing & scrambled data

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

16 Dec 2014 10:55:15 WARN  [TaskExecutor-master-540-ProcessTask [8813821100982]] [10.192.131.179] [FOUserAgent] Content overflows the viewport of an fo:block-container in block-progression direction by 39000 millipoints. (No context info available)
16 Dec 2014 10:55:15 WARN  [TaskExecutor-master-540-ProcessTask [8813821100982]] [10.192.131.179] [FOUserAgent] Glyph "Č" (0x10c, Ccaron) not available in font "Helvetica".
16 Dec 2014 10:55:15 WARN  [TaskExecutor-master-540-ProcessTask [8813821100982]] [10.192.131.179] [FOUserAgent] Glyph "�" (0x8c) not available in font "Helvetica".
It seems that some of the cs characters are not supported by the font "Helvetica".
What do you suggest - Shal we use another font for those countries?
I don't know if we can use a specific font only for these countries.

Hi Nabil

Is it possible to change the encoding?
I think at the moment it is a kind of ISO and it should be UTF-8 right?

The problem is not the encoding itself. The problem is that the font "Helvetica" does not support these characters. In my opinion, we don't really need to change the encoding but we need to find a font that supports all these characters.
Hi Ruben, Are you aware of a font which would be suitable for these cases?

Maybe we can use Helvetica World: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helvetica#Helvetica_World
Among other characters, it supports Cyrillic.
What would be the impact in the BE?

Please provide me a font that I can use.

the helvetica world is not free.

Note: file to be changed 

/distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelecContentCatalog/pdf/orderConfirmation.xsl

Nabil Benothman | Distrelec

It seems that the font Arial supports Cyrillic:
http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/font/arial_unicode_ms/blockview.htm?block=cyrillic
waiting on: DISTRELEC-6029
I tried with the Arial font but it does not support some characters. Please find another font. Thx

Please try with: Arial Unicode MS

  • http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arial_Unicode_MS

This font includes more than 38,917 characters. (Including the Czech character Č)
-http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/font/arial_unicode_ms/list.htm
It does not work.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/28211613/xmlgraphics-arial-unicode-ms-font-does-not-work-for-cyrillic
It looks that the font Arial is not installed in the Linux machine
Whats the status here?
Please assign to BE to install the required font in the server

Hi Rafi,
Ich hab ein Ticket zum HP gemacht. Sie muss eine Arial Schriftart installieren.
Rafael Burlet | Distrelec Ich habe gestern(17.03.2015) von HP Telephone anrufen gehabt. Sie installieren Arial Schriftart in 2 bis 3 Tagen.
Hi Surendra, Thanks. Please assign the ticket back to Ruben when it's done from HP-side.
As discussed today please ask Gregor Wirz for support.
Hi. It has been installed in test environment and let me know whether it is ok?.

Problem persists. Please see attachment.
You can test it yourself in test.distrelec.cz
After purchasing an item you will receive an email with the PDF attached.

Thanks
Still it has same font problem, see the attachment (0000G+65.pdf)
It is under HP Control. Status will be updated after completion.
I have just added fallback fonts, which could be tested after the todays(v3.3.1) deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6444] Multiple selections end up in error when filters not automated / numeric fields in all channels
item.description:
When deactivating the automation of the filters and choosing more than one value in a numeric field, you always end up with an error message.

The automatic update works fine, I can choose one value after the other, but when I do it manually, I do not get a result.

As this kind of values is probably the main reason why to manually select the filters, it is really necessary that this works.

e.g. http://www.distrelec.hu/hu/Szersz%C3%A1m-%C3%A9s-M%C3%A9r%C3%A9stechnika/Be%C3%A9p%C3%ADthet%C5%91-m%C5%B1szer/Anal%C3%B3g-kijelz%C5%91k/c/cat-L3D_532322

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Active-Components/Discrete-Semiconductors-Tubes/Diodes/c/cat-L3D_525222?wt_mc=ch.faf-c.en.diode
item.summary: Multiple selections end up in error when filters not automated / numeric fields in all channels

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela,

It is a problem from FACT-Finder.
If you enable the custom filter, then FACT-Finder deliver the correct result.(customfilter.xml)
If you disable the custom filter, then FACT-finder does not deliver the expected result.(noncustomfilter.xml)

The result could be read from the soap call.

Hi Surendra

It must be some issue that the shop causes - some wrong call back to FF or something. Cause it cannot be that you get a correct result when you choose one after the other and you get a perfectly correct result. But when you choose them at once, suddenly it should not give a correct result anymore. Here, I only see an issue with the communication between the shop and FF - so please check what the shop sends to FF.

Thanks.

Hi Surendra, some news from the FF consultant about this:

ich gehe davon aus, dass die ausgewählten Filter-Werte nicht korrekt an FACT-Finder übermittelt werden. Grundsätzlich können 0-Treffer nur auftreten, falls in verschiedenen Filter-Gruppen – aufgrund der Filter-Gruppen übergreifenden Und-Verknüpfung – mehrere Werte selektiert werden, die nicht zusammenpassen. Bei Auswahl mehrerer Werte innerhalb einer Filter-Gruppe, darf es hingegen keinen Unterscheid zwischen manuellem und automatischen Laden geben.
Könnten Sie bitte veranlassen, dass der Soap-Request (XML-Dateien) für beide Fälle bereitgestellt wird?

Can you make the SOAP request available to Mr. Türk (gt@omikron.net)?

Thanks & regards
Daniela

Hi Rafael

Who did the frontend implementation of this functionality: http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/17147/Filter%20-%20not%20automated%20-%203%20selections.jpg ?

Please assign the ticket to FE developer. The Problem here is that some filters are not correctly transmitted. I think there is a java script or something like that, which adds some filters in a wrong way. It is reproducable with the filter Länge=4mm.

Cheers
Will

Looks like the problem is caused by the units of these facets:

OK:
http://distrelec-ch.local:9001/search?q=cable&filter_Length~~mm=3&page=1&pageSize=10

NOK:
http://distrelec-ch.local:9001/search?q=cable&filter_Length~~m=3+mm&page=1&pageSize=10

The affected parameter is the filterString.

facets.jsp
<li class="facet-item -type-checkbox"
   data-facet-type="${facet.type.value}" 
   data-facet-name="${facetValueName}" 
   data-facet-value-name="${facetValueName}"
   data-filter-string="${facetValue.filterString}"
>

This parameter is built here:

DefaultDistProductSearchFacade.java
    public void addFilterstrings(final FactFinderProductSearchPageData<SearchStateData, ProductData> searchPageData) {
        if (searchPageData != null && searchPageData.getFilters() != null && searchPageData.getFilters().size() > 0) {
            for (final FilterBadgeData<SearchStateData> filterData : searchPageData.getFilters()) {
                filterData.setFilterString("filter_" + urlEncode(filterData.getFacetCode()) + "=" + urlEncode(filterData.getFacetValueName()));
            }
        }

        if (searchPageData != null && searchPageData.getOtherFacets() != null && searchPageData.getOtherFacets().size() > 0) {
            for (final FactFinderFacetData<SearchStateData> facetData : searchPageData.getOtherFacets()) {
                for (final FactFinderFacetValueData<SearchStateData> valueData : facetData.getValues()) {
                    valueData.setFilterString("filter_" + urlEncode(facetData.getCode()) + "=" + urlEncode(valueData.getName()));
                }
            }
        }
    }

For some reason is not building correctly the filterString.

For example, this one currently is: filter_Length~~m=3+mm
When it should be: filter_Length~~mm=3

Please assign to BE for more investigation.
Thanks

Another example of this error with numeric fields:

-NOK: (not auto apply filter)
/search?q=operationsverstärker op 833&filter_Bandbreite~~Hz=4 kHz

-OK: (auto apply filter)
/search?q=operationsverstärker+op+833&filter_Bandbreite~~kHz=4
Committed in v3.3. Ready for test deployment.

I still find this error. E.g. Dauergrenzstrom with the search for diode (CH-DE). I select one or several values and get an error message.

Furthermore, filters, which are added (weitere Filter hinzufügen), do not work at all in CH-DE at the moment. There, we'll have to investigate a little, if we decide to go without any customization...
I will activate the old FF config and retest it. Could be a config problem only.

Hi Daniela

I tested the filter in my local env. It is working correctly. Pls retest this ticket after the next Q deployment. I attached you two screenshots.

Cheers
Will
Please test today, thx.
For Laura and me, it's still the same behaviour. The added filters do not work (CH-DE and CH-FR and we assume in other ones the same).

Hi Ruben

Some filters are not working as excepted. It seems to be a FE problem only. I will show you the problem.

Cheers
Will&Daniela

Dear Daniela, dear David,

The 3 tickets from below are going on for some weeks now. I need to set up a deadline for when they will be ready. Please give me an estimate.

DISTRELEC-6581 - FF - missing facets / 0-value transmitted by FF
DISTRELEC-6444 - Multiple selections end up in error when filters not automated / numeric fields in all channels
DISTRELEC-6524 - Remove/Deactivate any lookup and sorting logic for facets in the shop

Thank you in advance,
Regards,
Oana

--> Please estimate and inform Oana accordingly

Thanks
/Daniela

Hi Daniela,

I was checking with Laura Vara Garcia and apparently this tickets is now working fine in Q, The error message seems to be solved.

Shall we close this ticket?

The current issue now is DISTRELEC-6443

Hi Ruben

It's not working for me, still (just sitting and checking with Laura to make sure it's not my eyes, which have a problem . It's about all the filters, which have to be added extra (Zusätzlichen Filter hinzufügen).

E.g. http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=kabel&&page=1&pageSize=10 --> take any of the additional filter, select some and activate the filters. Nothing happens.
If you activate the automated update, select the filter and do your choice, it works. Also, when you - after the first selection - deactivate the automated update again. It's a bit hard to make some really meaningful screenshots, so if you want, you can come over and we have a look at this together?

/Daniela
